messages.title: How Labour privatised the NHS
messages.content: The NHS works in spite of Labour, not because of it. Those who use the NHS the most are the British taxpayer. It's time we worked to take the 'Not Safe in Labour's Hands' labels off our hospitals.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP is committed to ensuring the NHS is always there free at the point of use for the people of Britain. The party highlights Labour's alleged failings and privatization of the NHS.

issues.health: UKIP proposes to ensure the NHS is always free at the point of use and criticizes Labour's management and privatization of the NHS.

contactInformation.address: Oldham Branch, UKIP, Freepost Plus RTEH-XLAC-XXCA, 1 King Street, Oldham, Greater Manchester, OL8 1EZ

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet focuses on criticizing Labour's alleged privatization of the NHS and emphasizes UKIP's commitment to keeping the NHS free for British taxpayers.
